scripts.build: echo "westegg-core" && bash -c "cd westegg-core && yarn build" && echo "westegg-digital-garden" && bash -c "cd westegg-digital-garden && yarn build" && echo "westegg-jasper" && bash -c "cd westegg-jasper && yarn build" && echo "westegg-misk" && bash -c "cd westegg-misk && yarn build"
